# Requirements Quality Checklist: View Conference Registration Prices

**Purpose**: Validate completeness, clarity, and consistency of UC-18 requirements for QA review
**Created**: 2026-02-06
**Feature**: /Users/chathilaratnatilake/Documents/University/WINTER 2026/ECE 493/ECE-493-CMS/specs/UC-18-view-registration-prices/spec.md

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/speckit.checklist` command based on feature context and requirements.

## Requirement Completeness

- [ ] CHK001 Are all three user stories reflected in functional requirements? [Completeness, Spec §User Stories, Spec §FR-001..FR-007]
- [ ] CHK002 Are requirements defined for retrieving prices from the database? [Completeness, Spec §FR-001]
- [ ] CHK003 Are requirements defined for displaying prices by attendee category? [Completeness, Spec §FR-002]
- [ ] CHK004 Are requirements defined for pricing-unavailable messaging? [Completeness, Spec §FR-003, Spec §FR-006]
- [ ] CHK005 Are requirements defined for retrieval failure handling? [Completeness, Spec §FR-004, Spec §FR-007]
- [ ] CHK006 Are requirements defined for guest/registered user visibility? [Completeness, Spec §FR-005]

## Requirement Clarity

- [ ] CHK007 Is the price display grouped by attendee category clearly defined? [Clarity, Spec §FR-002]
- [ ] CHK008 Is the unavailable pricing message content explicitly defined? [Clarity, Spec §FR-006]
- [ ] CHK009 Is the retry-later message content explicitly defined? [Clarity, Spec §FR-007]
- [ ] CHK010 Is visibility to guests and registered users unambiguous? [Clarity, Spec §FR-005]

## Requirement Consistency

- [ ] CHK011 Do edge cases align with functional requirements without contradictions? [Consistency, Spec §Edge Cases, Spec §FR-003..FR-007]
- [ ] CHK012 Do assumptions align with availability and access requirements? [Consistency, Spec §Assumptions, Spec §FR-001..FR-005]
- [ ] CHK013 Are acceptance scenarios consistent with messaging requirements? [Consistency, Spec §Acceptance Scenarios, Spec §FR-006..FR-007]

## Acceptance Criteria Quality

- [ ] CHK014 Are success criteria measurable and verifiable? [Acceptance Criteria, Spec §SC-001..SC-003]
- [ ] CHK015 Do success criteria map to requirements (display, unavailable, retry)? [Traceability, Spec §SC-001..SC-003, Spec §FR-001..FR-007]
- [ ] CHK016 Are success criteria free of implementation details? [Clarity, Spec §SC-001..SC-003]

## Scenario Coverage

- [ ] CHK017 Are primary price display flows fully covered by requirements and scenarios? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 1, Spec §FR-001..FR-002]
- [ ] CHK018 Are unavailable pricing flows covered in scenarios and requirements? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 2, Spec §FR-003, Spec §FR-006]
- [ ] CHK019 Are retrieval failure flows covered in scenarios and requirements? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 3, Spec §FR-004, Spec §FR-007]

## Edge Case Coverage

- [ ] CHK020 Are edge cases written as explicit requirements or measurable outcomes, not just questions? [Gap, Spec §Edge Cases]

## Non-Functional Requirements

- [ ] CHK021 Are response-time expectations specified for price retrieval? [Gap, Spec §Success Criteria]
- [ ] CHK022 Are access control requirements explicitly stated or intentionally out of scope? [Gap]

## Dependencies & Assumptions

- [ ] CHK023 Are dependencies on pricing availability documented? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK024 Are assumptions about CMS accessibility documented? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]
